thread.title: MOVES-UBS, Standard Chartered, ICAP, BNP Paribas, Jefferies
thread.title_full: MOVES-UBS, Standard Chartered, ICAP, BNP Paribas, Jefferies

title: MOVES-UBS, Standard Chartered, ICAP, BNP Paribas, Jefferies
text:
+0.14 
(Adds Goldman Sachs Group, BofA Merrill Lynch, HSBC Holdings (HKSE: 0005.HK - news ) ) 
July 2 (Reuters) - The following financial services industry appointments were announced on Thursday. To inform us of other job changes, email moves@thomsonreuters.com. 
UBS GROUP AG (Other OTC: OUBSF - news ) 
Alexander Gehrt is leaving his post as head of mergers and acquisitions in Germany and Austria at UBS (NYSEArca: FBGX - news ) , as the Swiss lender sharpens its focus on private banking, three people familiar with the matter said. 
GOLDMAN SACHS GROUP INC 
The Wall Street bank's William Anderson is joining New (KOSDAQ: 160550.KQ - news ) York-based boutique investment bank Evercore Partners Inc (NYSE: EVR - news ) , a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Thursday. 
BANK OF AMERICA MERRILL LYNCH 
The bank appoints Bill Murphy, Sally Carlson and Jonathan Brenner to its global equities prime brokerage division this week, spokeswoman Kristen Kaus said. 
HSBC HOLDINGS PLC 
Robert Lynch, head of G-10 currency strategy at HSBC Holdings in New York, has left the bank, Bloomberg reported, citing two people with direct knowledge of the matter. 
STANDARD CHARTERED PLC (HKSE: 2888.HK - news ) 
The bank has appointed Andreas Meletiou as chief executive officer for its Iraq operations effective July 1, a spokesperson for the bank said. 
MORGAN STANLEY INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT 
Morgan Stanley (Xetra: 885836 - news ) 's investment management unit appointed Daniel Hawkes as head of London discretionary and channels islands distribution. 
ICAP PLC (LSE: IAP.L - news ) 
The world's largest inter-dealer broker of over-the-counter derivatives appointed Jenny Knott as chief executive of post-trade risk and information services, effective Aug. 5. 
BNP PARIBAS SA (Xetra: 887771 - news ) 
The bank appointed Joris Dierckx as head of India operations, taking over from Jacques Michel, who will move to Bahrain as head of BNP (Paris: FR0000131104 - news ) 's corporate and institutional banking in the Middle East and Africa. 
JEFFERIES LLC 
Jefferies has hired an eight-person team from BB&T Corp to offer investment banking advice to automotive aftermarket companies, from suppliers and distributors to retailers and installers, people familiar with the matter said on Wednesday. 
HASTINGS INSURANCE GROUP 
The British insurer appointed four new non-executive directors to its board. (Compiled by Anet Josline Pinto and Lehar Maan in Bengaluru)
